Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/59th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted  buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 59th, Morgan, 61st and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 59th, Morgan, 61st and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at Halsted/59th
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Union, 58th, Morgan and 59th, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Union, 58th, Morgan and 59th, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/61st
ShortDescription: 94 buses temp. rerouted NB: California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California; SB: California, 59th, Western, 63rd and Calfornia, near California/61st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near California/61st.

Northbound buses will operate via California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California.

Southbound buses will operate via California, 59th, Western, 63rd and Calfornia.

Allow extra travel time.
